dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3096438D] RE: abuse report: warez on phpbbtheme.com (74.52.144.122)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

Subject: RE: abuse report: warez on phpbbtheme.com (74.52.144.122)

X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
In-Reply-To: <34f3c67f0702151316w30435f82y7a351b45915e582e@mail.gmail.com> 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Feb 2007 22:03:11.0957 (UTC) FILETIME=[15920050:01C7514D] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear  Vjacheslav Trushkin 
 
My name is Alejandro Suarez from Foley 
 
I´m personally investigating this issue. 
We bought this site (phpbbtheme.com) 6-8 months ago from a webmaster forum. 
(I dont renember if it was sitepoint or a similar one, we are searching for 
it) 
 
I will try to keep in contact with the seller. Until this point and until 
this clarify I have asked my people to remove all content and keep the site 
offline. 
 
If your email is right and this content was stolen all the site including 
the html and design templates will be inmediatly removed. 
 
I will update what I find about it in next days, but at first the site is 
offline already 
 
(Sorry about poor my english) 
 
Alejandro 
 
-----Mensaje original----- 
De: Vjacheslav Trushkin [mailto:cyberalien@gmail.com]  
Enviado el: jueves, 15 de febrero de 2007 22:17 
Para: info@inversorafoley.com; abuse@theplanet.com 
Asunto: abuse report: warez on phpbbtheme.com (74.52.144.122) 
 
Hello, 
 
This is abuse report for website phpbbtheme.com hosted at IP 74.52.144.122 
in your datacenter. 
 
They are offering for download designs for phpBB forum software stolen from 
other designers, including me, and replaced copyrights in those designs as 
if they have designed it. Its a clear copyright violation and should be 
considered as warez. 
 
URL: 
Their website: http://www.phpbbtheme.com/ 
 
Where they stole it from: 
Conundrum, Chairs: designed by mikelothar.com Morpheus, Aeolus, AcidTech: 
designed by me: phpbbstyles.com Charcoal, AirHead: designed by Zarron Media: 
zarron.com etc..  everything is stolen. 
 
Proofs: 
1. You can confirm authors for few styles at urls I provided above. 
2. Some of designs are offered on phpbb.com with original designer's 
copyrights. You can find them here: 
http://www.phpbb.com/phpBB/catdb.php?db=2 
3: Almost all of those designs are offered on phpbbhacks.com: 
http://www.phpbbhacks.com/templates.php 
You can see designs with exactly the same names on that website and by 
clicking on demo links you'll see correct copyright of original author, 
which has nothing to do with abuser's website. 
 
More detailed proof: 
You can confirm that designs are indeed stolen by downloading them from 
abuser's website, unpacking and looking in file "overall_footer.tpl" (its a 
text file). You will see that they have replaced designer's copyright with 
their own. 
 
 
Who am I, and why you should belive me instead of abuser: 
I'm former phpBB team member, which you can confirm on 
http://www.phpbb.com/about/ (I'm listed in "Past Contributors" 
section) 
 
I have also informed other designers who's designs are stolen by abuser, so 
you can expect emails from them too, and in case if my proof is not 
convincing enough I'm sure they'll provide different proof. 
 
Sincerely, 
Vjacheslav Trushkin.
